H0.text: Which area of London derives its name from a hunting call hum medieval times. Covent Garden

H1.text: Which area of London derives its name from a hunting call hum medieval times. Mayfair

H2.text: Which area of London derives its name from a hunting call hum medieval times. Bloomsbury

H3.text: Which area of London derives its name from a hunting call hum medieval times. SOHO

A4.text: The name 'Covent' comes from an Anglo-French term for a religious community, equivalent to 'monastery' or 'convent'.
